definition: a full mouth of (sth physical)/to have the mouth exclusively filled with (a certain language, lies, promises, etc)
to have lips covered in blisters
(idiom) to have a glib tongue/to talk big

sentences.english: With the petals in your mouth, spring atmosphere pervades mouthful.
sentences.chinese: 將花瓣含在嘴裏，讓滿嘴都是春的氣息。

sentences.english: Do not Cypriots in the mouthful of food, a one eat slowly.
sentences.chinese: 千萬不要塞得滿嘴的食物，慢慢一口一口喫。

sentences.english: The fool who caused you to pluck angrily at your hair may have been speaking words that you felt held little meaning.
sentences.chinese: 讓你狠抓頭髮的傻瓜可能是一個滿嘴廢話的人。

sentences.english: You've got chocolate all over your mouth.
sentences.chinese: 你把巧克力弄得滿嘴都是。

sentences.english: Don't worry, he's still full of one-liners and quips.
sentences.chinese: 別擔心，他仍然滿嘴俏皮話一針見血。

sentences.english: I pray you, sir, what saucy merchant was this, that was so full of his ropery?
sentences.chinese: 先生，這個滿嘴胡說八道的放肆傢伙是誰？

sentences.english: The shop-keeper smiled at me with his yellow teeth.
sentences.chinese: 店老闆朝我笑了笑，露出滿嘴黃牙。

sentences.english: The giants all seemed to be quarreling, using curses and rude catcalls.
sentences.chinese: 巨人們像是在吵架，滿嘴的詛咒和無禮的噓聲。

sentences.english: I nod, my mouth full of soup.
sentences.chinese: 我滿嘴都是湯，只能點點頭。

sentences.english: That foul mouth stands there bringing more ill fortune with his blasphemies.
sentences.chinese: 那一張臭嘴站在那兒滿嘴噴糞，只能帶來更多惡運。

sentences.english: Many middle-age people sport a full gleaming mouthful, much like hip-hop stars.
sentences.chinese: 許多中年人滿嘴金牙，就像街舞明星。

sentences.english: Suddenly, a little vampire bat flew from outside of the woods, with fresh blood full of his mouth.
sentences.chinese: 突然，一隻小吸血蝙蝠從樹林外飛回來，滿嘴鮮血。

sentences.english: His mouth froths , and the froth is the word.
sentences.chinese: 他正滿嘴唾沫，那唾沫便是那個字了。

sentences.english: Nothing compares to the sublime, creamy flavor and mouth feel of pure butter.
sentences.chinese: 醇香的奶油味，滿嘴都是純奶油，太棒了。

sentences.english: Most people cheat a little, but very few cheat a lot.
sentences.chinese: 絕大部分人撒一點謊，只有很少數滿嘴謊話。

sentences.english: No, I don't need any help, he said, reeking of booze.
sentences.chinese: 我沒事，我不需要什麼幫助，他滿嘴酒氣地說。
